name: Energence
description:
Your light..

Your light.. keep them alive.

Can you escape alive?

Made in 72h for Ludum Dare 46 within the concept of "Keep It Alive".

This is the first game I've ever created.

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow keys  - to move
  • C - to dash
  • Space - to jump
  • Enter - restart the level

Tools Used:

  • GameMaker Studio 2
  • Aseprite
  • FL Studio
